intro.title: BagreType
intro.subtitle: Discover the most efficient keyboard layouts through machine learning and human data
intro.howItWorksDescription: Our four-step process transforms your typing experience through data-driven optimization
intro.whyChooseDescription: Whether you're a programmer, multilingual writer, or just curious about typing efficiency
intro.readyToTransformDescription: Join thousands of users who have already optimized their typing experience

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We measure your typing patterns and reaction times to understand your unique typing behavior.

mlAnalysis.title: ML Analysis
mlAnalysis.description: Our algorithm analyzes linguistic patterns across languages to optimize layout efficiency.

customLayouts.title: Custom Layouts
customLayouts.description: Generate universal or language-specific keyboards tailored to your specific needs.

learnPractice.title: Learn & Practice
learnPractice.description: Master new layouts through gamified lessons and interactive practice sessions.

fasterTyping.title: Faster Typing
fasterTyping.description: Increase your typing speed by up to 40% with optimized layouts

contributeToScience.title: Contribute to Science
contributeToScience.description: Help build better models for everyone with anonymized data

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: Help us build the future of keyboard layouts
dataCollection.instructions: Follow the instructions on screen to complete the typing assessment

layout.title: What type of keyboard do you use?
layout.description: This helps us understand the physical layout you're typing on
layout.staggeredDescription: Traditional keyboard with offset rows (most common)
layout.ortholinearDescription: Keys arranged in a perfect grid (mechanical keyboards)

touchType.title: Can you touch type?
touchType.description: Touch typing means typing without looking at the keyboard
touchType.no: No, I look at the keyboard

wantToLearn.title: Do you want to learn touch typing?
wantToLearn.description: We can help you master touch typing in just a few weeks

benefits.faster: 2-3x faster typing - Increase from 30-40 WPM to 60-100+ WPM
benefits.accuracy: Better accuracy - Type without looking at the keyboard
benefits.fatigue: Less fatigue - Proper technique reduces strain
benefits.professional: Professional skill - Essential for many careers

wantToLearn.gamified: Our gamified learning system makes it fun and engaging, similar to Duolingo!
wantToLearn.yes: Yes, I want to learn touch typing
wantToLearn.no: No, I'll continue with my current method

share.title: Share Your Data?
share.description: Help improve keyboard layouts for everyone

dataTypes.reactionTimes: Reaction times for each key press
dataTypes.sequences: Time between consecutive keys in sequences

share.privacy: All data is anonymized and used solely for research purposes. No personal information is stored.
share.yes: Yes, share my data with the project
share.no: No, keep data locally (I can export it later)

test.title: Typing Test
test.instructions: Type each letter as quickly and accurately as possible
test.allDone: That's all I need from you, but I'd love if you typed some more.
test.focusOnAccuracy: Focus on accuracy first, then speed will follow naturally

results.title: Your Results
results.description: Performance analysis from your last typing test

letterPerformance.title: All-Time Letter Performance
letterPerformance.description: Average, best, and worst reaction times across all tests

horizontalChart.title: Letter Performance
horizontalChart.description: Average, best, and worst reaction times

learn.title: Learn Touch Typing
learn.description: Master the art of typing without looking at the keyboard
learn.whyLearnDescription: Touch typing is a skill that dramatically improves your typing speed and accuracy. With just 30 minutes of practice per day, you can increase your WPM from 30-40 to 60-100+.
learn.gamifiedNote: Many people find the learning process enjoyable through gamified typing practice, similar to Monkeytype or TypeRacer.
learn.getStartedDescription: First, let's see your current typing speed
learn.baselineTestDescription: Type a 30-word passage as quickly and accurately as you can
learn.baselineTestExplanation: Before we begin our learning journey, we'll test your current typing speed. This baseline will help track your progress as you learn.
learn.afterTestNote: After the test, you'll begin your personalized learning journey
learn.readyToLearnDescription: You've completed your baseline test. Let's start your learning journey!
learn.startLearningDescription: Begin your personalized touch typing lessons
learn.startLearningExplanation: Your baseline test results have been saved. Now you can start learning touch typing with personalized lessons designed for your skill level.

testResults.title: Baseline Test Results
testResults.greatJob: Great job! Now let's begin your personalized learning journey.

testScreen.title: Baseline Test
testScreen.description: Type the words as quickly and accurately as you can
testScreen.zenMode: Type anything you want... Press Esc when done
testScreen.signInPrompt: Sign in to save your progress and track your improvement over time

postBaseline.title: Welcome to Your Journey!
postBaseline.subtitle: Time to break those old habits and build something amazing

baselineResults.title: Your Baseline Results
baselineResults.description: This is your starting point - we'll track your improvement from here!

touchTyping.title: What is Touch Typing?
touchTyping.description: The art of typing without looking at your keyboard, using muscle memory.
touchTyping.bumpExplanation: Have you ever noticed that F and J keys have a little bump? Those are the touchtyping landmarks to show you where your index fingers should be so you dont have to look down at the keyboard.
touchTyping.gamerJoke: I see you there with that hand on WASD, you little gamer! üòè
touchTyping.choreography: Don't worry, we've all been there. Your fingers have been doing the same dance for years, and now we're about to teach them a whole new choreography.

expectations.title: Here's What to Expect
expectations.description: Your typing journey will have ups and downs, but the destination is worth it

speedDrop.title: Speed Drop
speedDrop.description: Your typing speed will drop at first - this is completely normal!

neuralRewiring.title: Neural Rewiring
neuralRewiring.description: Your brain is rewiring neural pathways - it takes time and patience

skyrocketSpeed.title: Skyrocket Speed
skyrocketSpeed.description: After dedicated practice, your speed will skyrocket beyond what you thought possible

encouragement.piano: Think of it like learning to play piano with your feet - awkward at first, but once you get it, you'll wonder how you ever lived without it!
encouragement.expert: Remember: Every expert was once a beginner

lessons.title: Your Typing Journey
lessons.subtitle: Descend into the depths and master each key

skipDialog.title: Skip to Lesson?
skipDialog.message: Are you sure you want to skip to this lesson? You can always come back to previous lessons later.

lessonsJourney.title: Lessons Journey
lessonsJourney.description: Progress through our structured learning path

complete.title: Lesson Complete! üéâ
complete.keepPracticing: Keep practicing to improve your speed!

congratulations.title: Congratulations! üéâ
congratulations.subtitle: You've unlocked a new superpower! Your fingers now dance across the keyboard with precision and speed.

achievements.lightningFastDescription: Your typing speed has transformed from hunt-and-peck to lightning-fast precision!
achievements.pinpointAccuracyDescription: Every keystroke hits its mark with surgical precision. No more typos slowing you down!
achievements.continuousGrowthDescription: This is just the beginning! Your typing skills will keep improving with practice.

progress.title: Your Amazing Progress
progress.subtitle: Let's see how far you've come!
progress.takeTest: Take a comparison test to see your final results!

improvements.keepPracticing: üí™ Keep practicing! Every keystroke makes you better!

motivation.description: Now you can practice as much as you want! Your typing journey has just begun, and with consistent practice, you'll continue to improve and reach new heights.
